column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday November 12 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: I-75/I-71 at Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.

column3: I-75/I-71 at Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: Traffic traveling to the Cincinnati area will be detoured to I-275 and I-471.
